Subject: ProServ - Host Inventory not Refreshing when Discovery is Run through Schedule
Description: When scheduling a Host Discovery, with setting to run Host Inventory when discovery completes.  The Host Inventory will refresh if you kick the discovery manually but does not run when the discovery is run through the schedule
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c:
1. Configure Host Discovery
2. Schedule Host Discovery
3. Kick off Host Discovery from schedule
4. Nothing happens
Next_Steps__c: Awaiting confirmation that the issue is resolved
Solution_Comment__c: This issue was a bug that was corrected in NEA v11.6.0.132+. We installed NEA v11.6.0.138 and the issue was resolved.
